Package ru.fsapp.util

Class FormatUtils

java.lang.Object
ru.fsapp.util.FormatUtils
public class FormatUtils extends Object
Utilities for formatting file system data. Provides methods to transform file information into readable format (sizes, dates, statistics).
Since:
2025-12-05

  • Method Details

    • formatSize

      public static String formatSize(long bytes)
      Formats file size in readable view (B, KB, MB, GB, TB). Converts number of bytes to human-readable format with units. Uses decimal logarithmic scale to determine the unit.
      Parameters:
      bytes - number of bytes to format
      Returns:
      formatted string like "123.45 MB"

    • formatDate

      public static String formatDate(Object time)
      Formats date to string by given format. Supports different types of input data:
      • FileTime - creation/modification time of file
      • Long - number of milliseconds since 1970
      Output format: dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm:ss
      Parameters:
      time - time object (FileTime or Long)
      Returns:
      formatted date string or "РІР‚вЂќ" if type is not supported
      See Also:
      • FileTime

    • countFiles

      public static long countFiles(Path dir)
      Counts number of files in directory recursively. Walks through entire folder tree and counts only regular files, excluding folders. Ignores access errors.
      Parameters:
      dir - path to directory for counting
      Returns:
      number of found files, 0 if error or folder is empty
      See Also:
      • countDirectories(Path)
      • calculateTotalSize(Path)

    • countDirectories

      public static long countDirectories(Path dir)
      Counts number of directories in directory recursively. Walks through entire folder tree and counts only subdirectories, excluding the root folder itself (hence "-1" at the end). Ignores access errors.
      Parameters:
      dir - path to directory for counting
      Returns:
      number of found subdirectories (minus the folder itself), 0 if error
      See Also:
      • countFiles(Path)
      • calculateTotalSize(Path)

    • calculateTotalSize

      public static long calculateTotalSize(Path dir)
      Calculates total size of all files in directory recursively. Sums sizes of all files in all subdirectories. Files that cannot be accessed are ignored (do not cause error). Folder sizes are not counted.
      Parameters:
      dir - path to directory for counting
      Returns:
      total size of all files in bytes, 0 if error
      See Also:
      • for converting to readable format
      • countFiles(Path)
